plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Rabbits love to munch on me!
🥗 I can be crunchy and good for you.
🌱 I am not a fruit or flower.

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I can be lots of different colors.
🐝 Bees make honey from my nectar.
💐 You can give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am big and tall, and I have many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me
🪵 I am made of wood
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am long and grow underground. I am orange and good to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Rabbits love to eat me.
🚜 Farmers grow me in their gardens.
🥕 You can eat me raw or cooked.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a tasty treat. You pop me to make a yummy snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You eat me at the movies!
🔥 I need heat to turn into a snack.
🌽 I grow on a cob.

plant.question: I grow on a vine and am green or purple. I am small and round and you can eat me.

hints.text: 🍇 Monkeys and Apes like me very much
🪴 I grow in bunches.
🍷 You can make juice from me.

plant.question: I am a big, round vegetable. People carve me into scary faces for Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I'm orange and round.
👻 You can put a candle inside me.
🌱 I grow on a vine in a field.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick stem and juicy leaves. You can use me to make a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I'm often green.
🥗 You can put dressing on me.
🫙 Sometimes I grow in a glass of water on the window sill!

plant.question: I am a long, green vegetable with seeds inside. Sometimes I'm pickled! What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 You can eat me with sandwiches.
🌱 I grow on a vine.
🧪 When pickled, I taste sour.

plant.question: I am a fruit with a prickly outside and a sweet yellow inside. I grow in warm places. What am I?

hints.text: 🍍 Spongebob lives in a house like me!
🌴 I grow on a plant, but not a tree.
🍹 I taste great in juice.

bug.question: I'm a little bug that flies and lands on flowers, what am I?

hints.text: 💐 I like to drink nectar
🦋 I have colorful wings
🐛 I start as a caterpillar

bug.question: I make honey, I live in a hive, and I can sting. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I love sweet things
⚠️ Be careful, I can poke!
🐝 I buzz around flowers

bug.question: I'm a bug that crawls, I carry food, and I live in a hill. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small
💪 I am strong for my size
🏠 I live with lots of friends

bug.question: I hop around and eat plants. I have long legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I like to jump high
🌿 I am green
🎵 I make a chirping sound sometimes

bug.question: I am red with black spots. People say I'm lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am small and round
🍀 People like to see me in their garden
⚫ I have dots on my back

bug.question: I spin a web and catch bugs. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is sticky
🕷️ I have many legs
🐛 I like to eat other bugs

bug.question: I fly around at night and I'm attracted to light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I like the darkness
💡 I like to visit lamps
🦋 I am related to butterflies

bug.question: I wiggle in the ground. I help the plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I live underground
🌱 I help make the soil better
🚫 I don't have any legs

bug.question: I glow in the dark and fly around at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I light up the sky
🌃 I only come out when it's dark
🔥 I'm sometimes called a lightning bug

bug.question: I eat leaves and turn into a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I change into something beautiful
🍃 I love to munch on plants
🦋 I go into a chrysalis
